price: 103. They will speak in a very low voice to each other (saying): "You stayed not longer than ten (days)."
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
